Articles.Content: Due to unfortunate file mismanagement, I've lost the Squad folder (in the Gamedata folder) for my install but I don't want to reinstall the 4gb game and move mods around just to get it back. Is there a place where the Squad folder for 1.12.2 is available to download? I can't seem to find one.

If you have the steam version just verify the game files. It will download the missing files. I believe the mods should be safe but just back them up or if you do not want to take the time to copy just cut and paste to desktop.
Thanks! Unfortunately I don’t have the steam version, but thank you anyways.
